definition: Generating the translation in the target language, making choices about word selection, syntax, and style appropriate to the target audience

positive_examples: Target production selected a colloquial equivalent rather than a literal rendering.
Producing the target text required restructuring the sentence for natural word order.
Target generation chose vocabulary appropriate to the technical domain.
The target production phase considered multiple phrasings before selecting the most natural option.
training_hints.disambiguation: Strategic target language generation, not mechanical output
